title: Is iOS 15 kernel cache encrypted?
content: I recently started researching ios kernel security and I've been struggling to find out whether the kernel cache is encrypted for iOS 15. Any help would be really appreciated.

answers_data.content: Apple stopped encrypting iOS kernelcache since iOS 10.

As mentioned, from iOS 10 onwards, the kernel is not encrypted.  That is since 2016.

From iOS 10 kernel is not encrypted, and here's Apple reasoning
